resources.string:
Developer: David Asensio - @dasensio13 
Game Designer: Reiner Knizia - @ReinerKnizia 
Year Published: 1999 
BGG: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/50/lost-cities 

Version 0.2 - 28/11/2012 
* Better design for info and credits 

Version 0.1 - 05/04/2012 
* Beta Development phase 
* Future options: 
	- Save Game 
	- Change number of rounds

* You can change player names by selecting them. 

* You set the value of the delivery selecting it and the cards played on it. 

* Total values and winner player are updated automatically.
